# assessment

kubeconfiguration for exercise 1, please configure the path to the admin.pem and admin-key.pem

kubeconfig:
```
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://34.147.88.104:6443
  name: kubernetes-epo
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes-epo
    user: admin
  name: kubernetes-epo
current-context: kubernetes-epo
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: admin
  user:
    client-certificate: assessment/bash_scripts/files/admin.pem
    client-key: assessment/bash_scripts/files/admin-key.pem
```
